name: Learn Numbers with Cars for Smart Kids
name_original: Learn Numbers with Cars for Smart Kids
description:
If your child can’t live without cars, the only way to learn to count and memorize numbers is to count cars!

Recommended for children 2-4 years of age, the game play was designed to encourage children to learn numbers 1 through 9 easily and quickly and at the same time develop fine motor skills.

Even if your child is not ready to count yet, s/he will surely have a thoroughly enjoyable time with cars and numbers.

Three game levels are different ways to learn numbers. They also help to keep your child entertained. Interface and touch controls are specially designed for toddlers.

Key Features:

- Enjoyable animation for right and wrong choices

- 3 game levels are different ways to learn numbers

- Bonus star popping round after each correct choice

- In game achievements are displayed on a personalized prize shelf
